channel.title: iOS on Tyler Mumford
channel.description: Recent content in iOS on Tyler Mumford

item.title: Falling Spikes
item.description: January 2016 – July 2016 Falling Spikes is an iPhone game based on an idea by Scott Chapman. The player controls a bouncing ball by moving it left and right to avoid randomly falling spikes. Scott and I wanted to develop and publish this game for iOS devices with the hopes of making semi-passive income. His field is business, and mine is programming. The game took about 90 hours to create.
